description: Meta-schema that describes the schema of a template

$schema.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema '$schema' field in a template, element, and field

type.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'type' field in a template, element, and field

schema:identifier.description: Schema describing the template's user-defined identifier

title.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'title' field in a template, element, and field

description.description: Schema describing the JSON Schema 'description' field in a template, element, and field

templateJSONLDContextFieldContent.description: Schema describing a '@context' field in a template

templatePropertiesFieldContent.description: Schema that describes a 'properties' field in a template

templateUIFieldContent.description: Schema that describes a '_ui' field in a template

templateRequiredFieldContent.description: Schema describing a 'required' field in a template

templateElementRequiredContent.description: Schema that describes the mandatory array items for the required field of a template element

pavCreatedOnContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes 'pav:createdOn' field content in a @context

pavCreatedByContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes 'pav:createdBy' field content in a @context

pavLastUpdatedOnContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes 'oslc:lastUpdatedOn' field content in a @context

oslcModifiedByContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes an 'oslc:modifiedBy' field in a @context

jsonLDLanguageFieldContent.description: Meta-schema specifying the schema of an '@language' field in a '@context/properties' field

annotationsContent.description: Schema that describes an _annotations field in an artifact

annotationsPropertiesContent.description: Meta-schema that specifies the content of an '_annotations' field in an artifact

annotationsContextPropertiesFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that describes an '_annotations' field in a @context/properties field in a schema artifact

annotationsJsonLDValueFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that specifies the schema for an '@value' field in an '_annotation' field

templateContextFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that describes the schema of a '@context' field in a 'properties' field in a template

jsonLDTypeFieldContent.description: Meta-schema specifying the schema of a '@type' field in a 'properties' field in a template, element or field

jsonLDIDFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that specifies the schema for a '@id' field

jsonLDIDFieldContentWithNull.description: Meta-schema that specifies the schema for a '@id' field that allows a null value

schemaNameFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that describes the schema of a 'schema:name' field in a 'properties' field in a template

schemaNameContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes a 'schema:name' field in a @context field

schemaDescriptionFieldContent.description: Schema that describes a 'schema:description' field in a 'properties' field

schemaDescriptionContextFieldContent.description: Schema that describes a 'schema:description' field in a @context field

skosPrefLabelContextFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that describes the schema of 'skos:prefLabel' field in a @context field

oslcModifiedByFieldContent.description: Meta-schema that describes the schema of an 'oslc:modifiedBy' field content in a 'properties' field

userSpecifiedFields.description: Schema that describes user-specified fields, which can be a template field, element, or a multiple fields or elements

stringArray.description: Schema that describes a possibly empty string array

propertyLabelContent.description: Schema that describes a property label in a _ui field in a template or element

propertyDescriptionContent.description: Schema that describes a property description in a _ui field in a template or element
